body:
Comment 1: 
Make.ccmd has commands to build Go build tools 6g,6l. You are building Go project. For
Go project you must use Make.pkg.

Please, change line

include $(GOROOT)/src/Make.ccmd

onto

include $(GOROOT)/src/Make.pkg

in your Makefile and try again. We will wait here.

Alex
_Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
